title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Behind the scenes: How AWS drives operational excellence & reliability (COP415)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 幕后揭秘：AWS如何推动卓越运营与可靠性 (COP415)
abstract: How does AWS maintain operational excellence at a global scale? We'll dive deep into our operational best practices, culture, and learnings we've developed to operate large-scale services. We will also demonstrate some of the most-loved features in Amazon CloudWatch by AWS operators that you can readily deploy to improve operational efficiency and reduce Mean Time To Resolve (MTTR). You'll learn best practices for implementing scalable observability, drawn from our experience operating some of the largest distributed systems on Earth.
abstract_cn: AWS 如何在全球范围内保持卓越运营？我们将深入探讨我们的运营最佳实践、文化以及我们在运营大规模服务过程中积累的经验教训。我们还将演示一些 AWS 运营人员最喜爱的 Amazon CloudWatch 功能，您可以立即部署这些功能以提高运营效率并缩短平均解决时间 (MTTR)。您将学习实施可扩展可观测性的最佳实践，这些实践源自我们运营地球上一些最大规模分布式系统的经验。

presenter.name: Imaya Kumar Jagannathan
presenter.title: Sr. Mgr WW Specialist Solution Architects
